features: The perfect bed on the go; soft, poly-cotton fitted pad cover with a plush, detachable comforter
Zip your quilt to the pad cover for a snug sleeping bag feel, or unzip your quilt and use it as a plush down throw
Take the comforter off, fold in half, and zip it up to create a summer sleeping bag
Available sizes: 25" x 78" (Wide Long), 40" x 72" (Doublewide 40), 50" x 78" (Doublewide 50)
Built-in pad coupler on doublewide sizes snuggles two 20" or 25" wide pads side-by-side
Pillow Barn – keeps your pillow tucked in tight all night
Easy valve access allows for pad inflation/deflation adjustment during use
Integrated bedroll style stuff sack with adjustable compression straps and carry handle for easy packing and quick deployment
